title: Stage Lv5-P2-S08
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: That she failed the exam was surprising to everyone.
That the company is expanding is good news.
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 그녀가 시험에 떨어졌다는 것은 모두에게 놀라운 일이었다.
sentences.en: That she failed the exam was surprising to everyone.
That the company is expanding is good news.
That he resigned has been confirmed.

sentences.kr: 프로젝트가 성공했다는 것은 팀 노력의 결과입니다.
sentences.en: That the project succeeded is the result of team effort.
That they are getting married has been announced.

sentences.kr: 회의가 연기되었다는 것은 예상치 못한 일이었습니다.
sentences.en: That the meeting was postponed was unexpected.
That the system was hacked has been reported.
That she was promoted was a natural outcome.
